column1: [title_desc name="SFMMod" desc="Assists new and old SFM users with installing SFM mods/content quick and simple." /]
[title_desc name="Animation Group Editor" desc="This script is used to help with organizing the animation sets of custom models." /]
[title_desc name="Auto-Rigger for Biped Models" desc="This script is used to help with creating the ik rig.py files for biped models. this script only supports 2-4 spine bones. " /]
[title_desc name="Anonymous Universal Animgroups" desc="Script for helping sort animgroups in sfm" /]
[title_desc name="A More Universal SFM Rig Script" desc="Sometimes you may find out that the model you want to pose/animate doesn't like the rig_biped_simple." /]
[title_desc name="The Assembly Script" desc="This script assembles multi-part DotA 2 heroes. It's used like a IK rig script." /]
[title_desc name="SFMPhys" desc="Physics System Plugin for SFM" /]
[title_desc name="The Portal 2 Interactive Filmmaker (IFM)" desc="The IFM is an early internal build of SFM from mid 2011 designed to run on the Portal 2 branch of Source!" /]
[title_desc name="VolvoWrench" desc="This is a GoldSource and Source engine save and demo parser and manager. " home_link="http://traderain.hu/VolvoWrench/" /]
[title_desc name="Listdemo" desc="A simple c# parser for .dem source engine demos. " home_link="https://github.com/Traderain/Listdemo-" /]
[title_desc name="HL2DemoPauser" desc="A tool to pause hl2 demos at x tick" home_link="https://github.com/Traderain/HL2DemoPauser" /]
